description: This is a React component implementing a dashboard page for event management, including listing events, viewing event details, RSVP functionality, and attendee display.

methods.name: openEvent
methods.description: Asynchronously opens an event, fetching its attendees and setting it as selected.

methods.name: onRsvp
methods.description: Handles RSVP submission for the selected event, sending the response to the API.
